alert.note: Alert for De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:53PM CDT until September 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... West central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Coushatta, or 16 miles northeast of Mansfield, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coushatta, Pleasant Hill, Edgefield, Powhatan, Lake End, Evelyn, Grand Bayou, Hanna, Loggy Bayou, Crichton, Rambin, Armistead, and Ajax. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine
